participant_1.name: Jake Thompson
participant_1.personality: brave, straightforward, and a bit nostalgic.
participant_1.background: i live in canada. i didn't graduate high school. i'm in the army. my grandfather served in world war a. my favourite food is shawarma.

participant_2.background: i am a little girl. i've superpowers. i like to make time stop. i'm very lonely. i live in the cloud.
